trans-unit.source: Contains information about the control callback field

seg-source.mrk: Contains information about the control callback field

target.mrk: Contains information about the control callback field

trans-unit.source: Contains information about a notification message

seg-source.mrk: Contains information about a notification message

target.mrk: Contains information about a notification message

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a null terminated string that defines the control callback field.

seg-source.mrk: Pointer to a null terminated string that defines the control callback field.

target.mrk: Pointer to a null terminated string that defines the control callback field.

trans-unit.source: The string comprises one or more "X" characters.

seg-source.mrk: The string comprises one or more "X" characters.

target.mrk: The string comprises one or more "X" characters.

trans-unit.source: Must be filled with the maximum width of the text that will be displayed in the callback field

seg-source.mrk: Must be filled with the maximum width of the text that will be displayed in the callback field

target.mrk: Must be filled with the maximum width of the text that will be displayed in the callback field

trans-unit.source: Must be filled with the maximum height of the text that will be displayed in the callback field

seg-source.mrk: Must be filled with the maximum height of the text that will be displayed in the callback field

target.mrk: Must be filled with the maximum height of the text that will be displayed in the callback field

trans-unit.source: It contains a string (taken from the control's format string) that defines a callback field.

seg-source.mrk: It contains a string (taken from the control's format string) that defines a callback field.

target.mrk: It contains a string (taken from the control's format string) that defines a callback field.

trans-unit.source: The structure receives the maximum allowable size of the text that will be displayed in the callback field.

seg-source.mrk: The structure receives the maximum allowable size of the text that will be displayed in the callback field.

target.mrk: The structure receives the maximum allowable size of the text that will be displayed in the callback field.

trans-unit.source: This structure is used with the $DTN_FORMATQUERY notification message.

seg-source.mrk: This structure is used with the $DTN_FORMATQUERY notification message.

target.mrk: This structure is used with the $DTN_FORMATQUERY notification message.
